title: Textile, 1920s
description: Polychrome block print on grey-tan natural linen. Elaborate serpentine branches with wild scrolling leaves in green and blue and brown, some patterned like a checker board. Branches support layered and pink flowers and strange fruit. Birds in blue and green or red and blue sit on branches. Repeats side to side; sides match up. Vertical repeat incomplete. Condition: soiled.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 1920s.
1920s. Medium:  block-printed linen. Gift of Mrs. Germaine Little. 1968-110-17.
